name: @llun/activities.schema
description: Validate ActivityPub and Mastodon with Zod

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && tsc --module commonjs --moduleResolution Node --outDir dist/cjs && tsc --module NodeNext --moduleResolution NodeNext --outDir dist/esm && tsc --emitDeclarationOnly --declaration --moduleResolution node16 --module node16 --outDir dist/types
scripts.release: rm -rf dist && npm run build && npm publish --access public

author: Maythee Anegboonlap <null@llun.dev>
